page.title: 15Rubery Youth Club
page.content: I go to the Rubery Youth Club which meets at a special building attatched to Waseley Hills High School. The Junior section ( 10 y.o. to 14 y.o.) meet on a Wednesday evening. It costs 75p. to become a member and all members then get membership cards. It will then cost 15p.per night to attend for members or 30p. for non-members. Activities available include snooker, table tennis and generally having a chat to friends and listen to music or watch T.V. all in the Youth Centre. There is also a bar which serves soft drinks and swwets. It is a great place to meet people. Also going on inside the Sports Hall of Waseley Hills High School are more energetic activities such as indoor soccer and badminton.({M. {Commins})
